description: The windflower, Anemone narcissiflora, is truly amazing. It is a perennial flower with simple, yet elegant white and yellow blooms, growing from easy-to-maintain and long-lived clumps under partial sun or full sun. The foliage of the windflower is a beautiful green shade, and its bright and cheery flowers will lift the spirits in any garden. It grows very quickly, and its hardy nature and drought-resistance makes it ideal for brightening up outdoor areas all year round. In spring, the flowers emerge from their tiny buds and stand proudly against the elements on long, slender stems. They are a stunning addition to any garden and a sight to behold.
